title: Skill Marketplace
loadError: Failed to load listings. Please try again.

starred.title: No Starred Skills
starred.body: You haven't starred any skills yet. Browse the marketplace and click the heart icon to save your favorites!

all.title: No Skills Yet
all.body: Be the first to share your skills with the community!

search.body: No skills match your search. Try different keywords or clear filters.

steps.1: Go to the Skills panel and create a skill
steps.2: Add a SKILL.md with instructions and any resource files
steps.3: Click "Publish to Market" in the skill options
steps.4: Share your skill with the community!

detail.error: Failed to load skill details. Please try again.

readme.empty: No README provided for this skill.

aboutForking.title: About Adding
aboutForking.description: Adding creates your own independent copy. Changes won't affect the original skill.

publish.title: Publish to Skill Market
publish.description: Share your skill with the community. You can update or unpublish it anytime.

commitMessage.label: Commit Message
commitMessage.placeholder: Describe what changed in this version

readme.label: README.md
readme.placeholder: Add documentation for your skill... (Markdown supported)

publishImmediately.label: Publish Immediately
publishImmediately.description: Make this listing visible in the marketplace right away

error.default: Failed to publish skill. Please try again.

fork.title: Add Skill: {{name}}
fork.description: Create your own copy of this skill to customize and use.
fork.skillNameHint: Give your copy a unique name
fork.error: Failed to add skill. Please try again.
